result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abarwanya Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imama Allah) mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa, abo bari mu basuzuguritse cane kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
